alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cotton, to 8 miles north of Floodwood, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cotton around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Toivola and Meadowlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
